pull_request.title: fix(ci): patch max retrieval forwards
pull_request.body:
### Checklist

- [ ] I have read the [coding guide](https://github.com/ethersphere/bee/blob/master/CODING.md).
- [ ] My change requires a documentation update, and I have done it.
- [ ] I have added tests to cover my changes.
- [ ] I have filled out the description and linked the related issues.

### Description
the extra retrievals are causing the ci environment to break down and many requests are reset. this patch helps the test pass.

commits.message: refactor: parity chunks does not need encryption
chore: extra batch listener log and salud tweaks (#4426)
fix(stamperstore): remove stamps belonging to expired batches
fix: make cache ops independent of parent context (#4423)
chore: upgrade go-ethereum and btcd modules (#4425)
chore: extra batch listener log and salud tweaks (#4426)
feat: enable P2P QUIC transport by default
